attributes.action: Get a grip of the benefit system.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: welfare benefits should be just enough to stop you from starving to death and keep you warm, they should not be enough to afford to run a car, buy a flat screen television, or sit round all day drinking and smoking. Its about time that the dole was looked at as a last resort and not a lifestyle choice. I have to work to afford my lifestyle, why should these career spongers get away with milking the system. I urge the government to stop being so eager to please the long term benefit claimers and spare a thought for the people who actually do something positive for this country.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
